tool_description: Applies advanced filtering criteria to search results including date ranges, mood, topics, and content characteristics.

entry_ids.description: List of entry IDs to filter

date_filter_start.description: Filter entries after this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

date_filter_end.description: Filter entries before this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

min_word_count.description: Minimum word count for filtered entries

max_word_count.description: Maximum word count for filtered entries

require_topics.description: Topics that must be present in results

has_tags.description: Whether to include only entries with user-defined tags

filter_logic.description: How to combine filters: 'AND' (all must match), 'OR' (any can match)

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for date filters
Invalid date range: start date must be before end date
Invalid mood filter: Use valid mood values like 'positive', 'negative', 'neutral', etc.
Invalid word count: min_word_count must be less than max_word_count and both must be positive
Invalid day_of_week: Use full day names in lowercase like 'monday', 'tuesday', etc.
Empty entry_ids: At least one entry ID must be provided for filtering
usage: Provide entry_ids and configure desired filters. Use filter_logic to control how multiple filters are combined.

filtered_entry_ids.description: Entry IDs that match the specified filter criteria

filter_summary.description: Summary of applied filters and their effect
